UMM WUâ€™AL PHOSPHATE PROJECT

China Huanqiu Construction singed the EPC contract of the world's largest phosphate plant. The project is the most upstream of the phosphorus chemical combination system, the ore beneficiation system with design capacity of 15.5 million tons / year, concentrate 5.3 million tons / year, is the world's largest phosphate ore beneficiation system. Project contract model is the EPC turnover project; the scope of work includes design, procurement, construction, commissioning and training. The installation includes coarse crushing area (mine), 14.5 km long bridge, outside the road and concentrator. The project is a key component of the Saudi Shamar Industrial City, the entire industrial city is expected to invest 7 billion US dollars, plans to complete in 2041. China Huanqiu construction undertakes the design, procurement and construction work of the crusher, conveyor and beneficiation.

As the general contractor for the laboratory, PKchem provides on-site technical services, that is, laboratory equipment installation, commissioning, training, which include the installation of furniture, analytical equipment, commissioning and training work. Large equipment is such as X-ray fluorescence, fusion machine and so on.
